message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront, but we both walk away with something good.
My turn to propose something fair, Alice.  This time, a bit closer to even. Deal?
Bob, time is running out and we're both losing money. My offer stands - let's be sensible and take it.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it before inflation eats our profits!
